text: Rich Man, Poor Man may refer to: * A line from the traditional counting poem "Tinker, Tailor" * Rich Man, Poor Man (1918 film), a lost American silent romantic drama * Rich Man, Poor Man (novel), a 1969 novel by Irwin Shaw * Rich Man, Poor Man (miniseries), a 1976 miniseries based on the novel * Rich Man, Poor Man Book II, a sequel miniseries * "Rich Man, Poor Man", a song by Peter, Paul and Mary from the album Late Again ==See also== * Rich Man, Poor Girl * Rich man and Lazarus, a parable of Jesus in the Gospel of Luke
title: Rich Man, Poor Man
